GhoulBite.Narrative: bites deeply, infecting the target with venom.

ShadowStrike.Narrative: strikes from the shadows, blinding their target.

InfernoBlast.Narrative: unleashes a furious ball of fire, burning the target.

IceSpike.Narrative: casts a sharp spike of ice, potentially freezing the target.

ThunderClap.Narrative: summons a mighty thunderclap, stunning the target.

EldritchCurse.Narrative: places a dark curse on the target, weakening their resolve.

StoneSkin.Narrative: hardens their skin to stone, significantly boosting defense.

VenomSpray.Narrative: sprays a toxic venom, poisoning and blinding the target.

MysticHeal.Narrative: casts a healing spell, restoring health.
